title.name: 标题
code: 这里是标题

<section style='border: 0px; margin: 0.8em 0px 0.5em; text-align: center; clear: both; box-sizing: border-box; padding: 0px; outline: none; position: relative;'><section style='display: inline-block; padding: 0.2em 0.5em 0.15em; font-size: 2em; margin: 0px auto; border-left-width: 1px; border-left-style: solid; border-color: #EF5F00; border-right-width: 1px; border-right-style: solid; font-family: inherit; font-weight: bolder; text-decoration: inherit; color: #EF5F00; box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.992157);'><section style='font-size: 0.8em; line-height: 1em; vertical-align: top; font-family: inherit; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit; box-sizing: border-box;'><section style='box-sizing: border-box;'>上方标题字多一点</section></section><section style='margin-top: 0.2em; line-height: 1; box-sizing: border-box;'><section style='display: inline-block; padding: 0px 0.5em; font-weight: bolder; font-family: inherit; box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgba(255, 255, 254, 0.992157);'><section style='box-sizing: border-box;'>主标题</section></section><section style='margin-top: -0.5em; margin-bottom: 0.5em; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-style: solid; border-color: #EF5F00; box-sizing: border-box;'></section></section></section></section>

<section style='border: 0px; display: block; margin: 0.8em 0px 0.5em; line-height: 1;  box-sizing: border-box; padding: 0px;'><section style='border-bottom-style: solid; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-color: #EF5F00; font-size: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; font-weight: inherit; text-align: inherit; text-decoration: inherit; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); box-sizing: border-box;'><section style='display: inline-block; height: 1.2em; padding: 0.1em; line-height: 1em; font-size: 1.4em; font-family: inherit; box-sizing: border-box; background-color: #EF5F00;'><section style='box-sizing: border-box;'>请</section></section><section style='display: inline-block; padding: 0.2em; line-height: 1; font-size: 1em; font-family: inherit; font-weight: inherit; text-align: inherit; text-decoration: inherit; color:#EF5F00; box-sizing: border-box;'><section style='box-sizing: border-box;'>输入标题</section></section></section></section>

code: 华丽丽的分割线

<section style='border: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; padding: 0px; outline: none; position: relative;'><section style='margin: 0.5em 0px 2px; border-top-style: solid; border-top-width: 1px; border-color: #EF5F00; box-sizing: border-box;'></section><section style='margin: 2px 0px 0.5em; border-top-style: solid; border-top-width: 2px; border-color: #EF5F00; box-sizing: border-box;'></section></section>

<fieldset style='border: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; width: 100%; margin: 0.5em 0px 1em; padding: 0px; outline: none; position: relative;'><section style='width: 100%; border-bottom-width: 2px; border-bottom-style: solid; border-color: #EF5F00; box-sizing: border-box;'><section style='width: 16px; height: 16px; margin: 0px 0px -9px 25%; border-left-width: 2px; border-left-style: solid; border-color: #EF5F00; border-bottom-width: 2px; border-bottom-style: solid; -webkit-transform: rotate(-45deg); box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);'></section></section></fieldset>

<fieldset style='border: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; width: 100%; margin: 0.5em 0px 1em; padding: 0px; outline: none; position: relative;'><section style='width: 100%; border-bottom-width: 2px; border-bottom-style: solid; border-color: #Ef5F00; box-sizing: border-box;'><section style='width: 16px; height: 16px; margin: 0px 0px -9px 65%; border-left-width: 2px; border-left-style: solid; border-color: #Ef5F00; border-bottom-width: 2px; border-bottom-style: solid; -webkit-transform: rotate(-45deg); box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);'></section></section></fieldset>

footer.name: 尾部
code:
「一起吃」是什么？
「一起吃」向您提供私家美食
我们集聚民间大厨
他们以诚心，创意和感情
为你寻找一流食材
用心制作手工美食

长按扫码关注，

据不完全统计，很多人关注「一起吃」后，

都被喜欢的人喊去一起吃饭了呢~
